Patsy Walker Properties, Inc.{{r|FF: Fifty Fantastic Years Vol 1 1}} | Leaders = [[Hedy Wolfe (Earth-616)|Hedy Wolfe]] | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Sophia McConnell (Earth-616)|Sophia McConnell]], [[Dorothy Walker (Earth-616)|Dorothy Walker]] | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = [[Millicent Collins (Earth-616)|Millie the Model]], [[Nancy Brown (Earth-616)|Nancy Brown]], [[Tom Hale (Earth-616)|Tom Hale]], [[Michael Walker (Earth-616)|Mickey Walker]] | Enemies = [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Patsy Walker]]{{r|Patsy Walker, A.K.A. Hellcat! Vol 1 5}} | Origin = | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = [[Centerville]], [[California (State)|California]]; formerly Montclair, [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]] | PlaceOfFormation = [[Centerville]], [[California (State)|California]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Otto Binder; Ruth Atkinson; Stan Lee; Al Hartley; Steve Englehart; Richard Howell; David Anthony Kraft; Ed Hannigan; Mark Gruenwald; Steven Grant | First = Avengers Vol 1 144 | History = [[Dorothy Walker (Earth-616)|Dorothy Walker]] began developing comic book series based on the activities of [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|her daugter]] and her friends.{{r|Avengers Vol 1 144}} With help from her model/publishing friend [[Millicent Collins (Earth-616)|Millie Collins]] and her sister [[Sophia McConnell (Earth-616)|Sophia McConnell]], Dorothy developed a very popular media empire on the persona [[Patsy Walker]]. However, [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Patsy]] actually hated the notoriety the series brought on.{{r|Defenders Vol 1 89}}{{r|Marvel Fanfare Vol 1 59}} [[File:Patsy Walker, A.K.A. Hellcat! Vol 1 1 Textless.jpg|thumb|200px|right|[[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Patsy Walker]] as [[Hellcat]] shocked by her fandom]] The Patsy Walker comics went out of print until the rights reverted to [[Hedy Wolfe (Earth-616)|Hedy Wolfe]] after the death of Dorothy and the (temporary) death of Patsy. Hedy renamed the company '''Patsy-Hedy Entertainment''' and began republishing the classic Patsy Walker comics.{{r|Avengers Annual Vol 2 2000}}{{r|Patsy Walker, A.K.A. Hellcat! Vol 1 1|5}} Once with the help of [[Jessica Jones (Earth-616)|Jessica Jones]] and [[Jennifer Walters (Earth-616)|Jennifer Walters]], Patsy found something that could void Dorothy's contract to Hedy -"if one of the parties does not have the mental capacity", and the ill Dorothy was under heavy morphine - and managed to get back the rights to the comics bearing her name.{{r|Patsy Walker, A.K.A. Hellcat! Vol 1 7}} ==Comic Book Titles== * ''[[Miss America Magazine Vol 1|Miss America Magazine]]'' * ''[[Patsy Walker Vol 1|Patsy Walker comics]]'' * ''[[Teen Comics Vol 1|Teen Comics]]'' * ''[[Patsy and Hedy Vol 1|Patsy and Hedy comics]]'' * ''[[Girls' Life Vol 1|Girls' Life comics]]'' * ''[[A Date with Patsy Vol 1 1|A Date with Patsy special]]'' * ''[[Patsy Walker's Fashion Parade Vol 1|Patsy Walker's Fashion Parade special]]'' | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = * After becoming the CEO, [[Hedy Wolfe (Earth-616)|Hedy Wolfe]] tried to change the company name to '''''Hedy''-Patsy Entertainment''', but she was voted down by the board members.{{r|Avengers Annual Vol 2 2000}} | Links = }} [[Category:Companies]]
